plot: Victor, a prestigious and successful businessman from Coahuila, Mexico, is obsessed by the legend that an Indian woman told him in his childhood. His life is spent in a conventional manner with a family that knows abut his constant infidelities. When the woman that nurtured Victor in his childhood is dying, she sends for him and for his real son, Jose Francisco, who currently works as Victor's driver. Both respond to her call and travel back to the town where they grew up. After they bury their old woman, their lives twist unexpectedly.
title: Travesía del desierto
